Leasedlayer offers Germany Xen Linux VPS Hosting Services at very low prices. Our Xen Virtual Private Servers are suitable for smaller and as well as large scale entrprises. Get a dedicated resources on the package you choose for your website or application. Have full control over any linux operating system and ip table modules. Best suited for Private VPN, Gameservers, eCommerce websites targeting Europe Traffic.​

- Xen-PV Platform - Flexibility, Secured and Low overhead.
- Full Control - Root Access over SSH(Secure Shell).
- High Volume Network - 100Mbps Unmetered Burstable Network.
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee - Maximum Available SLA
